Q1
```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
 install.packages('ISLR')
 install.packages('dplyr')
 library(ISLR)
 library(dplyr)

apps<-College$Apps
bootsApp <-NULL
set.seed(1900)
for(i in 1:1000){
my_samp=apps%>%sample(.,length(.),replace=TRUE)%>%mean()
bootsApp<- c(bootsApp,my_samp)
 }
 hist(bootsApp)
 quantile(bootsApp, c(0.1,0.9))
# 2835.596 - 3186.701
```

 
 Q2
 library(ISLR)
 library(dplyr)
apps<-College$Apps
bootsApp <-NULL
set.seed(0)
Start <- Sys.time()
for(j in 1:1000){
my_samp=apps%>%sample(.,length(.),replace=TRUE)%>%mean()
bootsApp<- c(bootsApp,my_samp)}
 hist(bootsApp)
 quantile(bootsApp, c(0.1,0.9))
 Finish <- Sys.time()
 Finish - Start
 ## 2837.151 - 3187.078
 ## time difference 0.04484105 secs

Q3
## null hypoth : private & public = 0
## alt hypoth : public > private
pub <- tapply(College$Apps,College$Private,mean)
pub
## no = 5729 ; yes = 1977.929
my_stat <- pub[1]-pub[2]
my_stat
## yes = -3751.991
set.seed(90)
samp_d<-NULL
for(i in 1:10000){
NewDat <- data.frame (a=College$Apps, priv=sample(College$Private,777))
my_stat_boot <-tapply(NewDat$a,NewDat$priv,mean)
samp_d <- c(samp_d,my_stat_boot[1]-my_stat_boot[2])
}
hist(samp_d,xlim=c(-1000,1000))
sum(samp_d >= my_stat)/10000
## = 0
## reject the null
